location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 229 x 178mm, on sheet 328 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: Plan of Murbat Bay [Mirbāţ, Oman], located between Murbat and Jabal Ali [Qarāt Bin ‘Alī]. The plan indicates hydrology and settlements, as well as providing some indication of relief in the form of hachures. Also indicated on the plan is a proposed site for seaplane moorings.Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
